ErrorWithAccessToken.title: Error with Access Token
ErrorWithAccessToken.message: There was an error when requesting an access token, a request hs not gone through properly.

UnauthorisedEmail.title: Un-Authorised Request
UnauthorisedEmail.message:
Thank you for your content request but, unfortunately, we are unable to process it as the details you have provided do not match those in our system.

As stated on our web-site and on our request form, we will only accept requests for content from our library from authorised users.

If your organisation is not registered it may do so by following the instruction here: https://digital.nhs.uk/services/national-clinical-content-repository-copyright-licensing-service#how-to-register-with-the-copyright-licensing-service. 

If your organisation is already register however you have received this email, your email is not registered as an authorised user to request from our library. Please contact an authorised individual from your organisation, they will be able to request content on your behalf.

If there are any further issues please contact ‘clin.licences@nhs.net’.

Kind regards,

NHS Licensing team

RequestedContent.title: Requested Content
RequestedContent.message:
Thank you for your request for content from the NHS Library.

Attached you will find your requested documents

Kind regards,
NHS Licensing Team
